mil7.7.8:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘magavikassa cattari angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani cattari angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.7.8:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena appamiddhena bhavitabbam.
mil7.7.8:1.4: Idam, maharaja, magavikassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.8:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, magaviko migesuyeva cittam upanibandhati;
mil7.7.8:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena arammanesuyeva cittam upanibandhitabbam.
mil7.7.8:2.3: Idam, maharaja, magavikassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.8:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, magaviko kalam kammassa janati;
mil7.7.8:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena patisallanassa kalo janitabbo ‘ayam kalo patisallanassa, ayam kalo nikkhamanaya’ti.
mil7.7.8:3.3: Idam, maharaja, magavikassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.8:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, magaviko migam disva hasamabhijaneti ‘imam lacchami’ti;
mil7.7.8:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena arammane abhiramitabbam, hasamabhijanetabbam ‘uttarim visesamadhigacchissami’ti.
mil7.7.8:4.3: Idam, maharaja, magavikassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
